column4: Hi ! Any of you know what is the problem when I type my address http://192.168.1.1/ it doesn't want to show me any defauld apache2 file ? I have install the phpmyadmin and cant have access to the phpmyadmin welcome web page .. why ?
try ifocnfig in the console and make sure your IP is the same there as you think it is
default file .. never touch that directory
